弗洛伊德相信个体原欲的发展，如升华（sublimation）概念所示，为不断转换客体。人生来即属“多相变态”（polymorphously perverse），任何客体都可能成为快感之源。随不同发展阶段，人会固著于特定欲望客体——初为（oral stage）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Greek polumorphos, from polu- 'many' + morphē 'form'

means.word_mean: 1. an organism that can assume more than one adult form as in the castes of ants or termites
